Week 1: 2 x 8-10 e/s, Rest 30 seconds between sets.
Week 2: 2 x 10-12 e/s, Rest 30 seconds between sets.
Week 3: 2 x 12-15 e/s, Rest 30 seconds between sets.
Make it easier: Return to the floor after each rep.
Make it harder: Lead with a resistance band or small weight.

Week 1: 2 x 12-14 alt, Rest 30 seconds between sets.
Week 2: 2 x 16-18 alt, Rest 30 seconds between sets.
Week 3: 2 x 20-24 alt, Rest 30 seconds between sets.

Week 1: 3 x 10-20 seconds, Rest 45 seconds between sets.
Week 2: 3 x 15-25 seconds, Rest 45 seconds between sets.
Week 3: 3 x 20-30 seconds, Rest 45 seconds between sets.
Make it harder: Imagine stirring a bigger pot with a wider arm movement.

Week 1: 2 x 16-20 alt, Rest 45 seconds between sets.
Week 2: 2 x 24-30 alt, Rest 45 seconds between sets.
Week 3: 2 x 30-40 alt, Rest 45 seconds between sets.
Make it easier: Place feet on the floor for more stability.
Make it harder: Use a small plate, dumbbell, or kettlebell if quality can be maintained.
Take seconds to lower on each rep.

Make it easier: Lift off the floor only as far as you can. Increase over time.
